Text.valUnicode: Please Enter User Id and Password

ExpSyntax.val: 'User Is Not Active. Contact to SIS!!'
'You Must Change your Password At First Login!!'

Text.valUnicode: Note:-Password Must be One of the Last Five Passwords
Note:-Please verify your mail id first

ExpSyntax.val: 'Your Password Has Been Send To Your Mail Address!!'
'Password Should Match With One of the Last Five Passwords!!'
'Mail ID Can Not Be Left Blank!!'
'Password Should Not Be Same From Previous 5 Passwords!!'
'New Password Does Not Match With New Password!!'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select password from check_password where REGEXP_LIKE (':1','[A-Z]')
SELECT password from chECK_PASSWORD where NOT REGEXP_LIKE (':1','[^]^A-Z^a-z^0-9^[^.^{^}^ ]')

ExpSyntax.val: 'Password Should Not Be Same From Previous 5 Passwords!!'
'New Password Does Not Match With New Password!!'
